text:
="preserve">Jaime Alves Magalhães (28 March 1965 – 21 September 2020), known as Alves, was a Portuguese footballer who played as a midfielder. He was born in Espinho, Portugal. He made 135 appearances for Boavista F.C. between 1985 to 1991 and another 85 between 1992 to 1998. He also played for the Portugal national football team between 1988 to 1989.
Alves died on 21 September 2020, aged 55.
